Guy-sama."},{"lineNumber":70961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホーネット派にいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Her being in the Hornet faction might be influenced by reason."},{"lineNumber":70963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そういえば言ってなかったけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, now that I think of it, I haven't said it demon."},{"lineNumber":70966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに身長は145センチ！","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, her height is 145 centimeters!"},{"lineNumber":70967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うっひゃー、小っちゃいー！　可愛いー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow—so tiny! So cute!"},{"lineNumber":70968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「142のピグちゃんと3センチ差！","translatedEnglishLine":"Just 3 centimeters taller than Pig-chan, who's 142 cm!"},{"lineNumber":70969,"originalJapaneseLine":"　144のチルディちゃんと1センチ差よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Only 1 cm taller than Tildy-chan, who’s 144 cm!"},{"lineNumber":70970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ジュリアちゃんなんて149センチだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia-chan is 149 cm, so"},{"lineNumber":70971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとシルキィ様の方が見下ろされるってわけ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"amazingly, Silky-sama is the one looked down upon!"},{"lineNumber":70972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見た目は中々キリッとした美人っぽくもあり……","translatedEnglishLine":"Her appearance is quite sharply beautiful..."},{"lineNumber":70973,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...but..."},{"lineNumber":70974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーん、残念！","translatedEnglishLine":"Aww, what a shame!"},{"lineNumber":70975,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのご尊顔が今は見られないー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You can't see her noble face right now!"},{"lineNumber":70976,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これはもう！　本編で確認するしかないわね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, you just have to check in the main story!"},{"lineNumber":70977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、あなた！","translatedEnglishLine":"So, to you!"},{"lineNumber":70978,"originalJapaneseLine":"　続きをどうぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please continue reading!"},{"lineNumber":70979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおおお！","translatedEnglishLine":"Wooooooah!"},{"lineNumber":70980,"originalJapaneseLine":"　筋肉魔人ことレキシントン様だー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the muscle demon, Lexington-sama!"},{"lineNumber":70981,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レキシントン様は鬼の魔人！","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington-sama is a demon of the ogre kind!"},{"lineNumber":70982,"originalJapaneseLine":"　豪腕が自慢の筋骨隆々、","translatedEnglishLine":"Boasting mighty arms and a muscular build,"},{"lineNumber":70983,"originalJapaneseLine":"　典型的パワータイプな魔人さんよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"he's a typical power-type demon!"},{"lineNumber":70984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦闘方法もとってもシンプル！","translatedEnglishLine":"His combat style is extremely simple!"},{"lineNumber":70985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殴る！　蹴る！　ブチ壊す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Punch! Kick! Smash!"},{"lineNumber":70986,"originalJapaneseLine":"「力任せにドカーン！","translatedEnglishLine":"Forcefully BOOM!"},{"lineNumber":70987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　が大好きな豪快なお方だったようね」","translatedEnglishLine":"He seems to love this rough-and-tumble way of fighting."},{"lineNumber":70988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実はランス様って以前に","translatedEnglishLine":"Actually, Lord Rance had seen"},{"lineNumber":70989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レキシントン様を見たこと自体はあるのよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington-sama before."},{"lineNumber":70990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様が以前、空飛ぶ闘神都市、","translatedEnglishLine":"Once, when Lord Rance was exploring the flying battle god city,"},{"lineNumber":70991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イラーピュを冒険していらした時のこと","translatedEnglishLine":"Irappu,"},{"lineNumber":70992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謎の巨人の死体を発見したんだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"he discovered the corpse of a mysterious giant,"},{"lineNumber":70993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それがこの画像右下のミイラさんね","translatedEnglishLine":"which is the mummy shown at the bottom right of this image."},{"lineNumber":70994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、レキシントン様ったらおいたわしい……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Lexington-sama, how pitiful..."},{"lineNumber":70995,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、ランス様は忘れられちゃってるようだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Though, it seems Lord Rance has been forgotten."},{"lineNumber":70996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この世界に詳しいような、あなただと、","translatedEnglishLine":"For someone like you, who is familiar with this world,"},{"lineNumber":70997,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むしろレキシントン様よりも、","translatedEnglishLine":"rather than Lexington-sama,"},{"lineNumber":70998,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使徒のお二人の方が馴染み深いかもね","translatedEnglishLine":"you might be more familiar with the two apostles."},{"lineNumber":70999,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらのお二人は今までに","translatedEnglishLine":"These two have appeared here and there before."},{"lineNumber":71000,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の所でちらほら出ていたの","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":71001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その目的は今は亡き主、","translatedEnglishLine":"Their purpose is to revive their late master,"},{"lineNumber":71002,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レキシントン様の復活！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington-sama!"},{"lineNumber":71003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人とも魔血魂を飲ませるに相応しい、","translatedEnglishLine":"Both of them are suitable to drink the demon blood soul,"},{"lineNumber":71004,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アトランタさんはとっても悪い奴を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta-san is quite a bad one,"},{"lineNumber":71005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジュノーさんはとっても美しい奴を","translatedEnglishLine":"while Juno-san is a very beautiful one."},{"lineNumber":71006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までずーーーっと探していたんですって！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They've been searching for them all this time!"},{"lineNumber":71007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまり！　今回の復活は！","translatedEnglishLine":"In other words! This resurrection!"},{"lineNumber":71008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遂にその努力が結実されたってことよね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the fruit of their long efforts!"},{"lineNumber":71009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおーーーい、おいおい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa—hey, hey!"},{"lineNumber":71010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長かった！　長かったねー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It took so long! So long, didn't it!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乗り物に変化させたりも出来たそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it was even possible to transform into a vehicle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現在はとある事情により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, due to certain circumstances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派で戦ってらっしゃるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she is fighting with the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々はホーネット派の魔人よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but originally, she was a demon of the Hornet faction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その性格は争いを好まない平和主義者」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her personality is that of a pacifist who does not favor conflict.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが故に人間と共存を選んだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of that, she chose coexistence with humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイ様の遺志を継ぐホーネット派に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and naturally joined the Hornet faction that carries on the will of the Demon King Guy-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つくのは当然と言えるわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say it's only natural for her to be with them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、これは秘密の話なんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but this is a secret story...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ガイ様のことを敬い、愛していたそうよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is said to have respected and loved Demon King Guy-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her being in the Hornet faction might be influenced by that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りの影響もあるのかもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That might be part of the reason.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そういえば言ってなかったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, now that I think of it, I haven't said it before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はこーんな鎧姿で分からないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now, in this armored appearance, you can't tell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ様は女性の魔人ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Silky-sama is a female demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに身長は145センチ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, her height is 145 centimeters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっひゃー、小っちゃいー！　可愛いー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow—so tiny! So cute!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「142のピグちゃんと3センチ差！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just 3 centimeters taller than Pig-chan, who's 142 cm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 144のチルディちゃんと1センチ差よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only 1 cm taller than Tildy-chan, who’s 144 cm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジュリアちゃんなんて149センチだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia-chan is 149 cm, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとシルキィ様の方が見下ろされるってわけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: amazingly, Silky-sama is the one looked down upon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見た目は中々キリッとした美人っぽくもあり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her appearance is quite sharply beautiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだけど……」
「あーん、残念！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aww, what a shame!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのご尊顔が今は見られないー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't see her noble face right now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これはもう！　本編で確認するしかないわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, you just have to check in the main story!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、あなた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, to you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 続きをどうぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please continue reading!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wooooooah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筋肉魔人ことレキシントン様だー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the muscle demon, Lexington-sama!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レキシントン様は鬼の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama is a demon of the ogre kind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪腕が自慢の筋骨隆々、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boasting mighty arms and a muscular build,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 典型的パワータイプな魔人さんよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's a typical power-type demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦闘方法もとってもシンプル！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His combat style is extremely simple!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴る！　蹴る！　ブチ壊す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Punch! Kick! Smash!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「力任せにドカーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forcefully BOOM!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が大好きな豪快なお方だったようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to love this rough-and-tumble way of fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実はランス様って以前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, Lord Rance had seen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様を見たこと自体はあるのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様が以前、空飛ぶ闘神都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once, when Lord Rance was exploring the flying battle god city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イラーピュを冒険していらした時のこと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Irappu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎の巨人の死体を発見したんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he discovered the corpse of a mysterious giant,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがこの画像右下のミイラさんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is the mummy shown at the bottom right of this image.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、レキシントン様ったらおいたわしい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lexington-sama, how pitiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ランス様は忘れられちゃってるようだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, it seems Lord Rance has been forgotten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界に詳しいような、あなただと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For someone like you, who is familiar with this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろレキシントン様よりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rather than Lexington-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒のお二人の方が馴染み深いかもね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you might be more familiar with the two apostles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらのお二人は今までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two have appeared here and there before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の所でちらほら出ていたの
「その目的は今は亡き主、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their purpose is to revive their late master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様の復活！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人とも魔血魂を飲ませるに相応しい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of them are suitable to drink the demon blood soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタさんはとっても悪い奴を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta-san is quite a bad one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュノーさんはとっても美しい奴を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while Juno-san is a very beautiful one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までずーーーっと探していたんですって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've been searching for them all this time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり！　今回の復活は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words! This resurrection!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にその努力が結実されたってことよね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the fruit of their long efforts!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおーーーい、おいおい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa—hey, hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長かった！　長かったねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It took so long! So long, didn't it!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

This resurrection!"},{"lineNumber":71008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　遂にその努力が結実されたってことよね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the fruit of their long efforts!"},{"lineNumber":71009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおーーーい、おいおい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa—hey, hey!"},{"lineNumber":71010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長かった！　長かったねー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It took so long! So long, didn't it!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乗り物に変化させたりも出来たそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it was even possible to transform into a vehicle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現在はとある事情により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, due to certain circumstances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派で戦ってらっしゃるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she is fighting with the Cavebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々はホーネット派の魔人よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but originally, she was a demon of the Hornet faction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その性格は争いを好まない平和主義者」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her personality is that of a pacifist who does not favor conflict.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが故に人間と共存を選んだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of that, she chose coexistence with humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ガイ様の遺志を継ぐホーネット派に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and naturally joined the Hornet faction that carries on the will of the Demon King Guy-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つくのは当然と言えるわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say it's only natural for her to be with them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、これは秘密の話なんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but this is a secret story...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ガイ様のことを敬い、愛していたそうよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is said to have respected and loved Demon King Guy-sama.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her being in the Hornet faction might be influenced by that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺りの影響もあるのかもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That might be part of the reason.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、そういえば言ってなかったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, now that I think of it, I haven't said it before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はこーんな鎧姿で分からないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right now, in this armored appearance, you can't tell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィ様は女性の魔人ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Silky-sama is a female demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに身長は145センチ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, her height is 145 centimeters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっひゃー、小っちゃいー！　可愛いー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow—so tiny! So cute!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「142のピグちゃんと3センチ差！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just 3 centimeters taller than Pig-chan, who's 142 cm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 144のチルディちゃんと1センチ差よ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only 1 cm taller than Tildy-chan, who’s 144 cm!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジュリアちゃんなんて149センチだから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia-chan is 149 cm, so

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとシルキィ様の方が見下ろされるってわけ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: amazingly, Silky-sama is the one looked down upon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見た目は中々キリッとした美人っぽくもあり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her appearance is quite sharply beautiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだけど……」
「あーん、残念！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aww, what a shame!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのご尊顔が今は見られないー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You can't see her noble face right now!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これはもう！　本編で確認するしかないわね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, you just have to check in the main story!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、あなた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, to you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 続きをどうぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please continue reading!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wooooooah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筋肉魔人ことレキシントン様だー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the muscle demon, Lexington-sama!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レキシントン様は鬼の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama is a demon of the ogre kind!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪腕が自慢の筋骨隆々、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boasting mighty arms and a muscular build,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 典型的パワータイプな魔人さんよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he's a typical power-type demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦闘方法もとってもシンプル！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His combat style is extremely simple!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴る！　蹴る！　ブチ壊す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Punch! Kick! Smash!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「力任せにドカーン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forcefully BOOM!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が大好きな豪快なお方だったようね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to love this rough-and-tumble way of fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実はランス様って以前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Actually, Lord Rance had seen

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様を見たこと自体はあるのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様が以前、空飛ぶ闘神都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once, when Lord Rance was exploring the flying battle god city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イラーピュを冒険していらした時のこと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Irappu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎の巨人の死体を発見したんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he discovered the corpse of a mysterious giant,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それがこの画像右下のミイラさんね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is the mummy shown at the bottom right of this image.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、レキシントン様ったらおいたわしい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lexington-sama, how pitiful...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ランス様は忘れられちゃってるようだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, it seems Lord Rance has been forgotten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界に詳しいような、あなただと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For someone like you, who is familiar with this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろレキシントン様よりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: rather than Lexington-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒のお二人の方が馴染み深いかもね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you might be more familiar with the two apostles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらのお二人は今までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These two have appeared here and there before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の所でちらほら出ていたの
「その目的は今は亡き主、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their purpose is to revive their late master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントン様の復活！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington-sama!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人とも魔血魂を飲ませるに相応しい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of them are suitable to drink the demon blood soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタさんはとっても悪い奴を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta-san is quite a bad one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジュノーさんはとっても美しい奴を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while Juno-san is a very beautiful one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までずーーーっと探していたんですって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've been searching for them all this time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまり！　今回の復活は！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In other words! This resurrection!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂にその努力が結実されたってことよね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the fruit of their long efforts!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおーーーい、おいおい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa—hey, hey!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長かった！　長かったねー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It took so long! So long, didn't it!
